snippet.title: Exa Soldier android indie game - shooter space game
snippet.description:
Exa Solider is an adventure game. 
Explore, exterminate hostile creatures and get new armors to increase your power.

You lost the contact with your base and crashed on a hostile planet. Your mission is to retrieve your power to come back home.

Explore the planet, destroy the creatures, discover new places and complete the missions.
Exa Soldier has a lot of level and is not a typical linear game, Exa Soldier is a beautiful Adventure.

Try it, it's FREE.

Get it on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kleongames.exasoldier
